hero.subtitle: Behind the craft
hero.heading: Engineering systems that feel thoughtful, grounded in research, and designed for longevity.
hero.lead: I'm Prachi Jindal — a builder who pairs analytical rigor with human-centered curiosity. My work spans embedded platforms, full-stack experiences, and machine intelligence, all anchored by a product mindset and love for cross-functional collaboration.

stats.description: Hours mentoring classmates, teaching labs, and decoding complex topics through storytelling.
Hackathons, research sprints, and innovation challenges tackled to keep curiosity sharp.

hero.currently: final-year Electrical Engineering student at IIT Delhi, exploring edge AI and human-computer interaction.
hero.mission: build trustworthy technology that amplifies human potential, especially in education, accessibility, and sustainability.

experienceTimeline.title: Embedded Software Intern
experienceTimeline.description: Brought automation-first thinking to semiconductor validation labs by building modular test benches, data-driven filtering, and actionable reporting for device package variants.
highlights: Designed a Python-led orchestration layer that reduced manual QA cycles by 45%.
Crafted embedded C utilities for on-device telemetry, improving diagnostics visibility.
Introduced documentation rituals and pair-programming sessions to scale onboarding.

experienceTimeline.title: Teaching & Research Assistant
experienceTimeline.description: Guided signal processing cohorts, prototyped virtual lab experiences, and supported research on adaptive filtering and acoustic modeling.
highlights: Architected a Next.js based virtual lab hub adopted by 80+ learners every semester.
Co-authored lab manuals emphasizing intuition, instrumentation, and debugging patterns.
Mentored student teams to ideate, scope, and deliver capstone prototypes within 12 weeks.

experienceTimeline.title: Product Engineering Fellow
experienceTimeline.description: Collaborated with interdisciplinary teams to build experimental experiences, from sustainability dashboards to community platforms.
highlights: Deployed a full-stack analytics tool that visualized campus energy usage and actionable insights.
Facilitated design critique sessions, aligning engineering trade-offs with user research.
Introduced CI pipelines and code quality tooling to student teams for maintainability.

skills.subtitle: Toolbox
skills.heading: Technologies and practices I reach for often
skills.description: I enjoy connecting low-level engineering with human-centered products. Here's what I lean on to make that happen.

education.subtitle: Education
details: Coursework focus: Digital Signal Processing, Control Systems, Data Structures, Machine Learning.
IEEE Robotics & Automation Society, Consulting Club, Women in STEM initiatives.
Dean's List 2023 & 2024 · Merit scholarship for academic excellence.

values.subtitle: Working principles
values.heading: How I show up for teams and products

principles.title: Systems thinking
principles.description: I map the problem space end-to-end, identifying leverage points and anticipating failure modes before they surface.

principles.title: Empathy-driven craft
principles.description: I translate user needs into product requirements, ensuring delight and accessibility remain first-class citizens.

principles.title: Bias for learning
principles.description: Every project is a chance to explore new tools, challenge assumptions, and document openly so others can grow too.

cta.subtitle: Next chapter
cta.heading: Curious about collaborating or mentoring?
cta.description: From research sprints to product incubation, I'm excited to partner on work that blends intellectual depth with practical shipping.
